findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The function mint allows an unlimited amount of tokens to be minted without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unstaked tokens getting stuck in the contract
findings.description: One user, if unstaked many times, could get their tokens stuck in the contract.

findings.title: Reward rate changes are not taken into account in LP staking
findings.description: The reward amount in LP staking depends on when the calculateRewardsAndLiquidity function is called and can even decrease over time due to changes in the reward rate and unstaked LP tokens.
